pages.text: The $(animus)Transcendent Blood Orb$() represents the ultimate achievement in blood magic mastery. This Tier 6 orb surpasses all previous iterations, capable of holding an astounding $(blood)300,000 LP$().$(br2)Crafted only at the pinnacle of altar construction, this orb serves as both a testament to your power and an essential tool for the most demanding blood magic endeavors.

Beyond mortal comprehension; the Transcendent Blood Orb channels life essence on a scale previously thought impossible.$(br2)With six times the capacity of a Weak Blood Orb, this artifact opens doors to rituals and crafts that lesser practitioners can only dream of.

pages.title: Requirements
pages.text: Creating the Transcendent Blood Orb demands:$(br)$(li)A fully constructed $(blood)Tier 6 Blood Altar$()$(li)$(will)Crystallized Demon Will Block$() as the base material$(li)80,000 LP for the transmutation$(br2)The fusion of crystallized demon will with this much life essence creates a resonance capable of containing power far beyond ordinary blood orbs.

Place the Crystallized Demon Will Block upon the tier 6 altar and infuse it with 80,000 LP. The demon will crystalline structure serves as a perfect vessel for storing vast quantities of life essence.

pages.title: Capabilities
pages.text: The Transcendent Blood Orb enables:$(br)$(li)300,000 LP storage capacity$(li)Tier 6 crafting recipes$(li)The most powerful ritual activations$(li)Extended crafting sessions without refilling$(br2)This orb is the final step in your journey as a Blood Mage; beyond this lies only mastery of the arcane arts themselves.

pages.title: Lore
pages.text: $(italic)Ancient texts speak of Blood Mages who achieved such profound understanding of life essence that they could reshape reality itself. The Transcendent Blood Orb is said to be a glimpse into that forbidden knowledge.$(br2)Those who wield such power walk a fine line between mortal and something... more.$()
